exceptions.exn: In environment u : nat -> R r : R H : is_LimSup_seq u r ls : Rbar Hls : is_LimSup_seq u ls Unable to unify "Rbar_lub ?M2373 = ?M2374" with "proj1_sig (exist (fun l : Rbar => is_LimSup_seq u l) ls Hls) = r".

In environment H0 : forall (E : Rbar -> Prop) (l : Rbar), Rbar_is_lub E l -> Rbar_lub E = l u : nat -> R r : R ls : Rbar Hls : is_LimSup_seq u ls x : Rbar i : is_LimSup_seq u x H : forall eps : posreal, exists N : nat, forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> u n < r + eps H1 : forall (eps : posreal) (N : nat), exists n : nat, (N <= n)%nat /\\ r - eps < u n Unable to unify "is_LimSup_seq u ls" with "x = r".

In environment H2 : forall (E : Rbar -> Prop) (l : Rbar), Rbar_is_lub E l -> Rbar_lub E = l u : nat -> R r : R ls : Rbar Hls : is_LimSup_seq u ls x : Rbar i : is_LimSup_seq u x H : forall eps : posreal, exists N : nat, forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> u n < r + eps H1 : forall (eps : posreal) (N : nat), exists n : nat, (N <= n)%nat /\\ r - eps < u n Unable to unify "exists N : nat, forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> u n < r + ?M3018" with "x = r".

original: intros u l H. unfold LimSup_seq. simpl. destruct (ex_LimSup_seq u) as [ls Hls]. destruct l. - apply Rbar_is_lub_unique. apply Hls. apply H. - apply False_ind. apply Rbar_is_lub_not_infinity. apply Hls. - apply False_ind. apply Rbar_is_lub_not_m_infinity. apply Hls.
